body: This is a big breaking change as the flags are now `pflags`. Closes #2455 ``` ➜ prometheus git:(cobra) ./prometheus -h ./prometheus --config.file="prometheus.yaml" Usage: prometheus [flags] Flags: --alertmanager.notification-queue-capacity int The capacity of the queue for pending alert manager notifications. (default 10000) --alertmanager.timeout duration Alert manager HTTP API timeout. (default 10s) --config.file string Prometheus configuration file name. (default "prometheus.yml") -h, --help help for prometheus --query.max-concurrency int Maximum number of queries executed concurrently. (default 20) --query.staleness-delta duration Staleness delta allowance during expression evaluations. (default 5m0s) --query.timeout duration Maximum time a query may take before being aborted. (default 2m0s) --storage.local.engine string Local storage engine. Supported values are: 'persisted' (full local storage with on-disk persistence) and 'none' (no local storage). (default "persisted") --storage.local.path string Base path for metrics storage. (default "data") --storage.tsdb.max-block-duration duration Maximum duration compacted blocks may span. (Defaults to 10% of the retention period) --storage.tsdb.min-block-duration duration Minimum duration of a data block before being persisted. (default 2h0m0s) --storage.tsdb.no-lockfile Disable lock file usage. --storage.tsdb.retention duration How long to retain samples in the storage. (default 360h0m0s) --version Print version information. --web.console.libraries string Path to the console library directory. (default "console_libraries") --web.console.templates string Path to the console template directory, available at /consoles. (default "consoles") --web.enable-remote-shutdown Enable remote service shutdown. --web.external-url string The URL under which Prometheus is externally reachable (for example, if Prometheus is served via a reverse proxy). Used for generating relative and absolute links back to Prometheus itself. If the URL has a path portion, it will be used to prefix all HTTP endpoints served by Prometheus. If omitted, relevant URL components will be derived automatically. --web.listen-address string Address to listen on for the web interface, API, and telemetry. (default ":9090") --web.max-connections int Maximum number of simultaneous connections. (default 512) --web.read-timeout duration Maximum duration before timing out read of the request, and closing idle connections. (default 30s) --web.route-prefix string Prefix for the internal routes of web endpoints. Defaults to path of -web.external-url. --web.telemetry-path string Path under which to expose metrics. (default "/metrics") --web.user-assets string Path to static asset directory, available at /user. ``` Pending: - [x] Renaming/removing flags based on #2634 - [x] Duration flag adjustments #1883 - [x] Moving the logger away from a global one to one that is passed around. Pending on prometheus/common#87 @fabxc @brian-brazil @grobie @beorn7 @SuperQ @juliusv --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/prometheus/prometheus/2844)
